Subject: Georgia
Description: AFD supports Georgia with a multi-year program of Policy Based Loans, with co-financing from KfW and grant support from the European Union.

Subject: AFD
Description: AFD partners with GIZ to implement the French-German initiative for low-carbon and energy-efficient building sectors.

Subject: AFD
Description: AFD partners with PEEB to support countries in their transition towards low-carbon, energy-efficient, and resilient building sectors.

Subject: PEEB
Description: PEEB supports Georgia in their transition towards low-carbon, energy-efficient, and resilient building sectors.

Subject: PEEB
Description: PEEB supports AFD in their efforts to support countries in their transition towards low-carbon, energy-efficient, and resilient building sectors.

Subject: PEEB
Description: PEEB supports GIZ in their efforts to implement the French-German initiative for low-carbon and energy-efficient building sectors.

Subject: GIZ
Description: GIZ partners with AFD to implement the French-German initiative for low-carbon and energy-efficient building sectors.

Subject: GIZ
Description: GIZ partners with PEEB to implement the French-German initiative for low-carbon and energy-efficient building sectors.

Subject: European Union
Description: The European Union provides grant support to AFD for their multi-year program of Policy Based Loans to Georgia.

Subject: AFD
Description: Upcoming PEEB Cool: Albania to be included in PEEB Cool, with funding dedicated (loans + grants) to EE improvement of public buildings
